short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Deployments by DeployHQ and custom CSS styles in GitHub pull requests

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- Full width page
- Better CSS styles of pull requests
- Move Draft pull requests to bottom
- Default sort of pull requests by recently updated
- DeployHQ deployments in list of pull requests
